About.hero_title: The Secret is in the Science
About.philosophy_p1: At Café, we believe the crust isn't just a vessel for toppings—it is the main event. Named after the Italian word for "the crust," our pizzeria was born from a singular obsession: achieving the perfect 72-hour cold-fermented dough.
About.philosophy_p2: By combining high-hydration techniques with traditional wood-fired methods, we create a crust that is airy, charred, and rich with complex flavor notes.
About.flour_desc: Sourced directly from the Caputo mills in Naples for that signature silky texture.
About.time_desc: The time we give our dough to develop its unique "leopard spotting" and light airiness.
About.temp_desc: The exact temperature of our oven to lock in moisture while creating a crispy exterior.

1.title: Pizza Margherita
1.description: A timeless Italian classic featuring our hand-stretched dough topped with vibrant tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and aromatic basil leaves.

2.title: Pizza Pepperoni
2.description: For the spice lovers—loaded with premium spicy pepperoni slices that crisp up in our stone oven over a bed of melted mozzarella.

3.title: Veggie Pizza
3.description: A garden-fresh delight topped with a colorful medley of bell peppers, red onions, mushrooms, and olives for a satisfying, healthy crunch.

4.title: Fries
4.description: Golden and crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside. Our signature fries are lightly seasoned with sea salt for the perfect side.

5.title: Mexican Potatoes
5.description: Rustic potato wedges tossed in a bold blend of Mexican spices, served with a zesty dipping sauce for an extra kick.

6.title: Fries with Jalapeno
6.description: Our classic crispy fries elevated with a layer of melted cheese and spicy pickled jalapenos for a true flavor explosion.

7.title: Espresso
7.description: A concentrated, bold shot of our premium roasted Arabica beans, delivering a rich crema and a powerful caffeine punch.

8.title: Cappuccino
8.description: The perfect balance of intense espresso, velvety steamed milk, and a thick layer of silky foam, topped with a dusting of cocoa.

9.title: Latte
9.description: A smooth and creamy favorite made with a double shot of espresso and plenty of steamed milk for a mellow, comforting drink.

10.title: Ice Cream
10.description: Three generous scoops of premium artisanal ice cream. Choose from our seasonal flavors for a refreshing and sweet finish.

11.title: Croissant
11.description: Buttery, flaky, and golden-brown. Our French-style croissants are baked fresh every morning to ensure maximum crispness.

12.title: Chocolate Cookies
12.description: Chewy, home-style cookies packed with large chunks of premium dark chocolate and a hint of sea salt for balance.

13.title: Oreo Milkshake
13.description: A thick and creamy blend of vanilla bean ice cream and crushed Oreo cookies, topped with whipped cream and more cookie crumbles.

14.title: Strawberry Shake
14.description: Made with real farm-fresh strawberries and whole milk for a naturally sweet, nostalgic treat that’s both smooth and refreshing.

15.title: Special Milkshake
15.description: Our chef's signature creation—a rotating gourmet recipe featuring unique toppings, house-made syrups, and premium garnishes.

16.title: Coca-Cola
16.description: The world's favorite sparkling soft drink, served ice-cold in a glass with a slice of lemon for ultimate refreshment.

17.title: Sprite
17.description: A crisp, clean, and lemon-lime flavored soda that is 100% caffeine-free and perfect for cutting through savory meals.

18.title: Fanta
18.description: Bright, bubbly, and bursting with fruity orange flavor. A fun and refreshing choice that pairs perfectly with our crispy fries.
